channel.title: Adding models for clients?

item.title: Adding models for clients?
item.dc:creator: @zez1ma_boy zez1ma boy
item.description:
@zez1ma_boy wrote:

if(s.startsWith(“add model”))
{
try
{
File dir = new File("./Models/"); //By TeleNubby
if(dir.isDirectory()) {
File[] files = dir.listFiles();
for(int cur = 0; cur < files.length; cur++) {
if(files[cur].exists() && files[cur].toString().endsWith(".gz")) {
int ModelIndex = Integer.parseInt(files[cur].toString().substring(9, files[cur].toString().length()-3));
byte[] abyte0 = GetModel(ModelIndex);
if(abyte0 != null && abyte0.length > 0){
aClass14Array970[1].method234(abyte0.length, abyte0, (byte)2, ModelIndex);
method77(“Model: “+ModelIndex+” successfully added.”, 0, “”, aBoolean991);
} else {
method77(“Model: Unable to find “+ModelIndex+”.gz”, 0, “”, aBoolean991);
}
}
}
}
}
catch(Exception e)
{
method77(“Model: Error adding models. (”+e+")", 0, “”, aBoolean991);}
}

I tihnk thats the command[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 27, 2008, 05:02:44 PM[/size][hr]so like ::addmodel #### i think credits to xx nub xx cause i followed his directions
